show.title: Let's Talk Mutual Funds: A Systematic, Smart Way to Make Them Work For You
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/AAamY9
show.description: 'Let's Talk Mutual Funds' by Monika Halan is a comprehensive yet accessible guide that demystifies mutual fund investing for Indian readers. The book breaks down complex investment concepts into simple strategies, teaching readers how to build a sustainable investment portfolio through systematic investing and smart fund selection.
show.description_secondary: 'Let's Talk Mutual Funds' by Monika Halan is a comprehensive yet accessible guide that demystifies mutual fund investing for Indian readers. The book breaks down complex investment concepts into simple strategies, teaching readers how to build a sustainable investment portfolio through systematic investing and smart fund selection.
